circle.name: Circle
circle.description: Move an object in a circular or elliptical path.

speed.name: Speed
speed.desc: The speed, in pixels per second, the object travels at.

acceleration.name: Acceleration
acceleration.desc: The rate of acceleration, in pixels per second per second.  Negative values decelerate.

angle.name: Angle
angle.desc: The angle of the path, in degrees.

radiusx.name: RadiusX
radiusx.desc: The radius of X axis, in pixels

radiusy.name: RadiusY
radiusy.desc: The radius Y axis, in pixels

ınitial-state.name: Initial state
ınitial-state.desc: Whether to initially have the behavior enabled or disabled.

comparespeed1.description: Compare the current speed of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the current speed.

speed1.name: Speed
speed1.desc: The speed, in pixels per second, to compare the current speed to.

compareradiusx2.description: Compare the current X radius of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the X radius.

radiusx1.name: RadiusX
radiusx1.desc: The value to compare the current X radius to.

compareradiusy3.description: Compare the current Y radius of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the Y radius.

radiusy1.name: RadiusY
radiusy1.desc: The value to compare the current Y radius to.

compareoriginx4.description: Compare the current X origin of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the X origin.

originx1.name: OriginX
originx1.desc: The value to compare the current X origin to.

compareoriginy5.description: Compare the current Y origin of the object.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare the Y origin.

originy1.name: OriginY
originy1.desc: The value to compare the current Y origin to.

setenabled5.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

state2.name: State
state2.desc: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.
